name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Domain Detective - Domain Generator and Expired Domains Hunter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate domain names and check for availability. Detect expired/available domains while surfing the web. Powered by Open AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free Seamless Domain Scanning
Domain Detective is a powerful yet discreet Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience. It automatically scans web pages for expired domains and available domain names as you surf the internet. The extension works quietly in the background, ensuring you are notified of any expired domains without interrupting your workflow. This feature can be easily turned off whenever you desire.

Instant Domain Availability Check
Effortlessly check domain name availability directly from your browser's search bar. Enter your domain ideas and get instant results. If a domain is available, it's added to your list, enabling you to compare prices from various providers, making your domain purchasing decision quick and informed.

AI-Powered Domain Name Generation
Leverage the power of AI to generate unique and creative domain names tailored to your specific needs. Describe your project and receive domain name suggestions based on your prompts. Customize the length and choose from top-level domains like .com, .net, .org, and more.

Privacy and Security
We prioritize your privacy. Domain Detective ensures that your data remains confidential and is processed locally on your device. Your search queries and generated domain names are never saved to any database or shared with third parties.


How to Get Started:

1) Install from Chrome Store.
2) Pin the Extension: Pin Domain Detective to your Chrome toolbar.
3) Activate Auto Scan: Turn ON "Auto Scan Websites" in the extension settings. This feature is OFF by default.
4) Test the Extension: Open a domaindet.com, and the extension will detect available domain. Click on the extension icon to review the results.
Unlock the potential of your domain hunting with Domain Detective. Install now and find your perfect domain effortlessly!
